articles.title: Allele-specific hormone dynamics in highly transgressive F2 biomass segregants in sugarcane (Saccharum species)
Cell wall metabolism and hexose allocation contribute to biomass accumulation in high yielding extreme segregants of a Saccharum interspecific F2 population
Allele-Specific Hormone Dynamics in Highly Transgressive F2 Biomass Segregants in Sugarcane (Saccharum spp.)
